programs.title: Integrated Financial Services
contents: This is a service to the Western Slope of Colorado providing financial management for at-risk and vulnerable individuals to identify barriers and become self-sufficient and housed to the best of our ability.

The Integrated Financial Services Program provides financial management of Social Security, Veteran Benefits, and private pay services to minimize fraud which includes paying household expenses in a timely manner that eliminates late notices and insures on time payments. We also provide our customers with community resources as needed.

Guardianship services are for those individuals that cannot make legal, and or medical decisions for themselves due to illness or accident when there is no next of kin available to provide this service.
Budget counseling is for individuals that request guidance and assistance to better understand their own finances.
services: Liaison between SSA, VA and clients

Fee for Services as established by Social Security Administration and Veterans Administration Representative Payee: $46.00 - $85.00 (This increases every year due to cost-of-living adjustment) VA Fiduciary: 4% of monthly benefit amount (subject to change due to cost-of-living adjustment set by VA)
programs.goal: The Joseph Center Integrated Financial Services program will set up direct deposit for receipt for clients benefits. This eliminates risk of theft, and ensures that money checks are immediately available.
